channel.title: Releases on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform

item.title: What's New in PrestaShop 8.0
item.description: PrestaShop 8 is a major update that brings an updated Symfony 4.4 version, compatibility with PHP 8.1, new password policy and session management features, support for WebP, and more.

item.title: What's New in PrestaShop 8.1
item.description: PrestaShop 8.1 is a minor upgrade, with major improvements. This new release brings along many time-saving features and more.

item.title: What's New in PrestaShop 9.0
item.description: PrestaShop 9 brings Symfony 6.4 LTS, PHP 8.4 support, the new Admin API, Hummingbird theme, improved SEO and security, and a faster, fully modern back office.
